instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.ALL_SYS: What is ALL_SYS? This is a typo of ALL_SYS_PWRGD When you see ALL_SYS, assume they meant to type ALL_SYS_PWRGD.
definitions.U1950: What is U1950? This chip often becomes corroded on pin 8 on the PP3V42_G3H pin causing PM_SLP_S4_L to go missing.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b not turning on sometimes
threads.message:
Hi,


It 's water damage machine. PPBUS was 8.20 so i checked and there was some shit near smc. Reballed it and now het 8,6V. It started few times loading untill desktop, worked ok but now sometimes it boots, sometimes make fan quarter and not booting, and now doesnt even boot. Checked all s5 lines and seems to be ok. Also changed <CHIP>U7400</CHIP> because it was badly damaged with some components near around,


Getting <SIGNAL>ALL_SYS</SIGNAL> 3.3 V but still not booting. If do smc by pass also booting sometimes other times not booting. Board has it's own life.

ISL625 also ok pins 17/18 3,5 Ohms 27/28 20 ohms


What can i check???

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b not turning on sometimes
threads.message:
Do you get voltage on all big coils?
Inspect <CHIP>U1950</CHIP> for corrosion.
Do you get 3V at both pins 7 & 3?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b not turning on sometimes
threads.message:
<CHIP>U1950</CHIP> Pin 7 S0 good geting 0V and pin 3 0V too. Both are pulsing machine try start. There is no visible corrosion on <CHIP>U1950</CHIP>.


Big coils L7320/10 L7630 L7430 pulsing when fan try to sping


Update. As i said before sometime it is booting and <CHIP>U1950</CHIP> pins 7 and 3 are 3,4 and coils L7320/10 1.8V and L7630 1.08V and  L7430 0.3V

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b not turning on sometimes
threads.message:
You should still have corrosion issue.
If nothing visible, try heating CPU with quality flux.
Just to burn accumulated crap underneath.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b not turning on sometimes
threads.message: noway informaticos. ALready tried, reflow CPU with good flux , reballed SMC againg if it have some bad ball, I cant understand why without even touching board sometimes it starts from magsafe and other times just trying to sping the fan

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b not turning on sometimes
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b not turning on sometimes
threads.message: not working now even smc bypass. Tried reballing smc again and now and same result. Will change smc from donor board tomorrow and back with results.
